name: Le Bon, la brute, le truand
text-muted: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

name: Il était une fois dans l'Ouest
text-muted: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

name: Django Unchained
text-muted: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

name: Impitoyable
text-muted: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

name: ...et pour quelques dollars de plus
text-muted: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down an escaped Mexican outlaw.
stars: ['Clint Eastwood', 'Lee Van Cleef', 'Gian Maria Volontè', 'Mara Krupp']

name: Le Trésor de la Sierra Madre
text-muted: Two down-on-their-luck Americans searching for work in 1920s Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

name: La ruée vers l'or
text-muted: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

name: L'homme qui tua Liberty Valance
text-muted: A senator returns to a Western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

name: Les rapaces
text-muted: The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved.

name: The Revenant
text-muted: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

name: Danse avec les loups
text-muted: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Native Americans, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

name: Butch Cassidy et le Kid
text-muted: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

name: Rio Bravo
text-muted: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

name: Le train sifflera trois fois
text-muted: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at "high noon" when the gang leader, an outlaw he "sent up" years ago, arrives on the noon train.

name: L'étrange incident
text-muted: When a posse captures three men suspected of killing a local farmer, they become strongly divided over whether or not to lynch the men.

name: La Horde sauvage
text-muted: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.

name: Les grands espaces
text-muted: A New England sea captain in the 1880s arrives at his fiancée's sprawling Texas ranch, where he becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over a valuable patch of land.

name: La prisonnière du désert
text-muted: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a years-long journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches after the rest of his brother's family is massacred in a raid on their Texas farm.

name: Les 8 Salopards
text-muted: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.
stars: ['Samuel L. Jackson', 'Kurt Russell', 'Jennifer Jason Leigh', 'Walton Goggins']

name: Tombstone
text-muted: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

name: Josey Wales hors-la-loi
text-muted: Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

name: Le plus sauvage d'entre tous
text-muted: Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash.

name: La rivière rouge
text-muted: Dunson leads a cattle drive, the culmination of over 14 years of work, to its destination in Missouri. But his tyrannical behavior along the way causes a mutiny, led by his adopted son.

name: La Chevauchée fantastique
text-muted: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

name: Wind River
text-muted: A veteran hunter helps an FBI agent investigate the murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation.

name: El Narco
text-muted: After being deported back to Mexico, a man has no choice but to join the vicious drug cartel that has corrupted his hometown in order to survive.

name: 3h10 pour Yuma
text-muted: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

name: Le shérif est en prison
text-muted: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

name: Les 7 mercenaires
text-muted: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

name: Un homme est passé
text-muted: A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town possessing a terrible past they want to keep secret, by violent means if necessary.

name: La cible humaine
text-muted: Notorious gunfighter Jimmy Ringo rides into town to find his true love, who doesn't want to see him. He hasn't come looking for trouble, but trouble finds him around every corner.

name: La poursuite infernale
text-muted: After their cattle are stolen and their brother murdered, the Earp brothers have a score to settle with the Clanton family.

name: Comancheria
text-muted: A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.

name: True Grit
text-muted: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

name: Le dernier des géants
text-muted: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

name: John McCabe
text-muted: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

text-muted: A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution.

name: Little Big Man
text-muted: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

text-muted: Broke small-time rancher Dan Evans is hired by the stagecoach line to put big-time captured outlaw leader Ben Wade on the 3:10 train to Yuma but Wade's gang tries to free him.

text-muted: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

name: Johnny Guitare
text-muted: After helping a wounded gang member, a strong-willed female saloon owner is wrongly suspected of murder and bank robbery by a lynch mob.

text-muted: A cowboy's obsession with a stolen rifle leads to a bullet-ridden odyssey through the American West.

text-muted: Deputy sheriff Destry tames the town of Bottle Neck, including saloon singer Frenchy.

text-muted: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

name: Wind River
text-muted: A veteran hunter helps an FBI agent investigate the murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation.

name: El Narco
text-muted: After being deported back to Mexico, a man has no choice but to join the vicious drug cartel that has corrupted his hometown in order to survive.

name: 3h10 pour Yuma
text-muted: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

name: Le shérif est en prison
text-muted: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

name: Les 7 mercenaires
text-muted: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

name: Un homme est passé
text-muted: A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town possessing a terrible past they want to keep secret, by violent means if necessary.

name: La cible humaine
text-muted: Notorious gunfighter Jimmy Ringo rides into town to find his true love, who doesn't want to see him. He hasn't come looking for trouble, but trouble finds him around every corner.

name: La poursuite infernale
text-muted: After their cattle are stolen and their brother murdered, the Earp brothers have a score to settle with the Clanton family.

name: Comancheria
text-muted: A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.

name: True Grit
text-muted: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

name: Le dernier des géants
text-muted: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

name: John McCabe
text-muted: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

name: Il était une fois... la révolution
text-muted: A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution.

name: Little Big Man
text-muted: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

name: 3h.10 pour Yuma
text-muted: Broke small-time rancher Dan Evans is hired by the stagecoach line to put big-time captured outlaw leader Ben Wade on the 3:10 train to Yuma but Wade's gang tries to free him.

name: Géant
text-muted: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

name: Johnny Guitare
text-muted: After helping a wounded gang member, a strong-willed female saloon owner is wrongly suspected of murder and bank robbery by a lynch mob.

name: L'Homme des vallées perdues
text-muted: A weary gunfighter in 1880s Wyoming begins to envision a quieter life after befriending a homestead family with a young son who idolizes him, but a smoldering range war forces him to act.

name: Winchester 73
text-muted: A cowboy's obsession with a stolen rifle leads to a bullet-ridden odyssey through the American West.

name: Femme ou démon
text-muted: Deputy sheriff Destry tames the town of Bottle Neck, including saloon singer Frenchy.

name: L'assassinat de Jesse James par le lâche Robert Ford
text-muted: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

name: Dead Man
text-muted: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange aboriginal American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

name: Légendes d'automne
text-muted: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

name: Des souris et des hommes
text-muted: A nomadic farm worker looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend during the Great Depression.

name: Jeremiah Johnson
text-muted: A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.

name: Ne tirez pas sur le shérif
text-muted: In the old west, a man becomes a Sheriff just for the pay, figuring he can decamp if things get tough. In the end, he uses ingenuity instead.

name: El Dorado
text-muted: Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with an old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara. Together with an old Indian fighter and a gambler, they help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher that is trying to steal their water.

name: Le signe de Zorro
text-muted: A young Spanish aristocrat must masquerade as a fop in order to maintain his secret identity of Zorro as he restores justice to early California.

name: The Rider
text-muted: After suffering a near fatal head injury, a young cowboy undertakes a search for new identity and what it means to be a man in the heartland of America.

name: Yahsi Bati
text-muted: In 1881, two Ottoman Secret Agents travel to the USA, at the Sultan's request, to deliver a valuable diamond as a gift for the President.

name: Open Range
text-muted: A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

name: Lone Star
text-muted: When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.

name: Retour vers le futur 3
text-muted: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure how to escape the Old West before Emmett is murdered.

name: Apportez-moi la tête d'Alfredo Garcia
text-muted: An American barroom pianist and his prostitute girlfriend go on a trip through the Mexican underworld to collect the bounty on the head of a dead gigolo.

name: L'homme des hautes plaines
text-muted: A gun-fighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

name: Les cow-boys
text-muted: Rancher Wil Andersen is forced to hire inexperienced boys as cowhands in order to get his herd to market on time but the rough drive is full of dangers and a gang of cattle rustlers is trailing them.

name: 100 dollars pour un shérif
text-muted: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian Territory.

name: Hombre
text-muted: John Russell, disdained by his "respectable" fellow stagecoach passengers because he was raised by Native Americans, becomes their only hope for survival when they are set upon by outlaws.
